an5.250:1.3: Yasmim, bhikkhave, puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tatharupam apattim apanno hoti yatharupaya apattiya sangho ukkhipati.
an5.250:1.5: ‘yo kho myayam puggalo piyo manapo so sanghena ukkhitto’ti.
an5.250:1.7: Bhikkhusu appasadabahulo samano anne bhikkhu na bhajati.
an5.250:1.8: Anne bhikkhu abhajanto saddhammam na sunati.
an5.250:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, yasmim puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tatharupam apattim apanno hoti yatharupaya apattiya sangho ante nisidapeti.
an5.250:2.3: ‘yo kho myayam puggalo piyo manapo so sanghena ante nisidapito’ti.
an5.250:2.5: Bhikkhusu appasadabahulo samano anne bhikkhu na bhajati.
an5.250:2.6: Anne bhikkhu abhajanto saddhammam na sunati.
an5.250:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, yasmim puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so disapakkanto hoti …pe… so vibbhanto hoti …pe… so kalankato hoti.
an5.250:3.3: ‘yo kho myayam puggalo piyo manapo so kalankato’ti.
an5.250:3.5: Anne bhikkhu abhajanto saddhammam na sunati.
an5.250:3.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava puggalappasade”ti.
